      Parameters:
      catId - id of the category to be moved
      oldFatherId - id of the old father of the category to be moved
      newFatherId - id of the new father under which move the category

    • checkCategoryExists

      public int checkCategoryExists​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if a category is present on the database
      Parameters:
      id - category id to check
      Returns:
      1 if present, -1 otherwise

      java.sql.SQLException
